scripts.yaml:chainlink: node ./create-yaml-file create-yaml --subgraph chainlink --env prod --universal-test-block null | mustache - mustache/yaml.mustache > subgraphs/synthetix-.yaml
scripts.codegen-allchainlink: npm run codegen:chainlink && npm run codegen:chainlink2 && npm run codegen:chainlink3 && npm run codegen:chainlink4 && npm run codegen:chainlink5 && npm run codegen:chainlink6 && npm run codegen:chainlink7 && npm run codegen:chainlink8 && npm run codegen:chainlink9 && npm run codegen:chainlink10
scripts.build-allChainlink: npm run build:chainlink && npm run build:chainlink2 && npm run build:chainlink3 && npm run build:chainlink4 && npm run build:chainlink5 && npm run build:chainlink6 && npm run build:chainlink7 && npm run build:chainlink8 && npm run build:chainlink9 && npm run build:chainlink10
scripts.deploy-idc:exchange: npm run graphauth && graph deploy --product hosted-service  horizon-protocol/mainnet-horizon-exchanger  -- subgraphs/synthetix-exchanger.yaml
scripts.deploy-idc:chainlink: npm run codegen:chainlink && npm run build:chainlink &&  npm run graphauth && graph deploy --product hosted-service horizonprotocol-git/testnet-horizon-zada -- subgraphs/synthetix-chainlink.yaml
